games.anarchy

Class Forecast

  • java.lang.Object
    • joueur.BaseGameObject
      • games.anarchy.GameObject
        • games.anarchy.Forecast

  • public class Forecast
extends GameObject
    The weather effect that will be applied at the end of a turn, which causes fires to spread.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Player controllingPlayer
      The Player that can use WeatherStations to control this Forecast when its the nextForecast.
      java.lang.String direction
      The direction the wind will blow fires in.
      int intensity
      How much of a Building's fire that can be blown in the direction of this Forecast.

      • Fields inherited from class games.anarchy.GameObject

        logs

      • Fields inherited from class joueur.BaseGameObject

        gameObjectName, id

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class games.anarchy.GameObject

        log

      • Methods inherited from class joueur.BaseGameObject

        toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • controllingPlayer

        public Player controllingPlayer
        The Player that can use WeatherStations to control this Forecast when its the nextForecast.

      • direction

        public java.lang.String direction
        The direction the wind will blow fires in. Can be 'north', 'east', 'south', or 'west'.

      • intensity

        public int intensity
        How much of a Building's fire that can be blown in the direction of this Forecast. Fire is duplicated (copied), not moved (transferred).
